name: onPlanet Token
description: onPlanet is an ecosystem of creators. We are visionaries building communities. We are communities creating economy. We give paltform to talent, link talent to teams, and connect teams to funding. OP combines hyper-deflationary tokenomics, brand identity, intellectual property control, and a truly social experience built to incentivize platform and investment growth for every Creator. While other projects aim for the moon, we invite you beyond, to craft a space of your own among the stars.
